english.segment1: The battle's over. My heart moves on. I kept my mouth shut. While you screamed and cried. All the lies, all the lies
english.segment2: The battle's over. My heart moves on. Stood and took the arrows. That cut through my heart. I stood alone, I stood alone
english.segment3: You broke down all my walls. I'll build them up again. The battle's over now, my heart moves on
english.segment4: Today I stand, to watch you fall. That's just to say I've had enough. Not even you. Can stop me now. My heart moves on can't stop me now
english.segment5: . My heart moves on. My heart moves on. My heart moves on. My heart.
